website_summaries.verdict: The best spray gel to purchase if you have curly hair that is difficult to tame on a daily basis.
pros: Uses a heavy-duty formula designed for the unique challenges of curly hair whether it is damp or dry
Moisturizes hair while giving it more flexibility to style
Will also slightly curl straight hair for a natural curly look without extensive product or extra equipment
cons: The spray pump can start to stick after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: This product will curl your hair. I have partially gray shoulder length Caucasian hair and if I liberally spray this on damp hair it will curl my hair very nicely. Used dry it is also effective but better on damp hair allowed to dry naturally. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Old Coast Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I have thin, wavy hair. Over the course of the day, it flattens and I look bald! If I apply this, just a few squirts on each side and back, my natural curls come alive! They stay like that over two days! I will spray a little in the morning and the curls wake right up. It doesn’t dry my hair and it doesn’t make my hair crunch like wrapping paper. I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Spray gel
customer_reviews.text: Love this spray gel! It has a nice scent, holds hair well, & is reasonably priced. It's hard to find a hair gel in a spray bottle- there are not a lot of brands that offer it. There are hair sprays, & there are hair gels that you squeeze from the bottle or tube, but there are not alot of options out there for a true "Spray gel". I love this one because it smells good, works well, & is very reasonably priced. 5++ stars!
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Best Curl Enhancer Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have tried Paul Mitchell and some others but this one is the best. I spray it on and let it air dry or slightly dry it with a blow dryer and it helps make amazing curls! My natural hair is only wavy and this helps make it curly without being crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan J

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Best spray gel ever. I have been using this gel for some time and I keep coming back to it because it works so well. Also, it's not sticky like some other gels out there.
customer_reviews.author: chel2305

customer_reviews.title: Frankenstein called he wants his hair spray back
customer_reviews.text: UGH UGH let me rephrase that if you like the Bride of Frankenstein look this is the product for you if you want to attract everyone from Bela Lugosi to Lon Chaney this is the product for you.Great for Halloween but not for everyone.Use at your own discretion.
customer_reviews.author: Hingham

customer_reviews.title: Great natural curls
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic for anyone with wavy/curly hair that isn't the tamest in the world. It really makes my hair look thicker and the curls more purposeful. The nozzle gets junky sometimes but if you spray it into your hands first that fixed the problem.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great spray hair gel!
customer_reviews.text: Love a spray on gel and leaves no flakes or stickiness even in humidity! I use it on my wet hair and never looks frizzy or stiff, no fragrance or any issues! Will buy this again! Great for beach and boat days!
customer_reviews.author: tony h.

customer_reviews.title: Really crunchy
customer_reviews.text: This does help define curls but it’s very hard and crunchy, not what I like at all. It makes me feel like my hair is going to break off. I think the Garnier curl renew milk spray is much, much better.
customer_reviews.author: T-bone

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was going to be more of like a spritz spray rather than like a water gun spray. It also makes your hair just a little bit crunchy and funny the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia James

customer_reviews.title: LONG time favorite
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for probably 10+ years and it helps define and hold my curls (type 3B) better than other sprays. I always come back to this product and incorporate into my hair routine. I used to LOVE their green soft curl cream that came in a tub, but they stopped making it a long time ago. The new curl cream isn’t as effective as the old one, so this spray is the only Garnier product I use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooths your curls!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product as when it dries and your hair is curled then your hair looks naturally curly! Doesnt look like I put gel on. Just a nice smooth curl@
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have naturally curly hair and I use this instead of hairspray or traditional gel. It doesn't get flakey and smooths out the frizz in humidity. When my hair is down I use this with curl lock cream and it works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hold!
customer_reviews.text: I love the hold of this product! I usually finish my hair off with a blower and it leaves amazing results! It's cheap and has many uses as well!
customer_reviews.author: Tony :)

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It definitely helps tame my curls, but makes them a bit crunchy for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: I love this shaping spray gel
customer_reviews.text: I love this shaping spray gel!! I have very fine thin hair that won't hold a curl & I've finally found a product that my curl stays all day!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Easy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, not messy and does the job as described
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: Worked well to help put hair into a ballet bun
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Garnier
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it gives my hair body and lift.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D

customer_reviews.title: Curls Curls Curls
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Incredible Product. I was amazed. Can use it on wet or dry hair. Comes our beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Maria P

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great without making hair stiff. Cheaper at Walmart when you can find it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Van Etten

customer_reviews.title: Greasy appearance
customer_reviews.text: It helps with curls but makes your hair appear greasy
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for twist curls!
customer_reviews.text: This works wonderfully! I'll just spray my gate with water and spray the product throughout my hair twist and my hair looks perfect all day!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Product is okay, but not a miracle worker. Curls are left a little sticky. Smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for My Hair Type
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Keeps my style all day without frizz or feeling stiff. I will definitely get this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really tames my unmanageable curls and makes them curls again. not many products do this!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Makes mornings a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Spritz and go in the morning. Makes things so easy. Just be sparing!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Only gel I use on my son's hair
customer_reviews.text: Best for my sons hair... no alcohol and great control
customer_reviews.author: Silvana O.

customer_reviews.title: ... after a few pumps but the product itself on good.
customer_reviews.text: The pump spray starts to stick after a few pumps but the product itself on good.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Works okay. Better with time. Not super sticky, is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey C.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok but not as good as others in this lineup
customer_reviews.author: William Sarsfield

customer_reviews.title: Surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wrong product but I am enjoying this unexpected surprise product! Happy accident!
customer_reviews.author: Kjo

customer_reviews.title: Great for a flexible hold.
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest gel ever because you don't have to get sticky stuff all over your hands & it smells good too!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Marie

product_meta.title: Garnier Fructis Style Curl Shape Defining Spray Gel, Curly Hair, 8.5 fl. oz.
product_meta.description:
Take control of your style! Garnier Fructis Style Curl Shape Defining Spray Gel boosts your wavy, permed or naturally curly hair to create curl definition with shine minus the frizz. This styling spray gel for curly hair gives you the power to create and control any style you want. HOW DOES IT WORK? This curl spray gel with Shea Butter has powerful holding technologies that provide ultra long-lasting hold without stickiness or buildup. GET INSPIRED! Create a "Dream Curls" look: Apply on slightly damp hair. Twist hair around finger to create ringlets. Blow-dry with diffuser or air-dry to create defined frizz-free curls. Finish any Curl Shape style with Garnier Fructis Hairspray for long-lasting hold. For more looks, tips and fun visit our Style Hub. • Styling spray gel for curly hair creates curl definition • Curl spray gel with Shea Butter provides long-lasting hold without stickiness or buildup • Boosts your wavy, permed or naturally curly hair with definition and shine minus the frizz • Get the power to create and control any curly style you want Spray generously onto slightly damp or dry hair. Scrunch hair, blow-dry or air-dry.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :8.5 x 1.8 x 1.8 inches; 8.5 Ounces
 * Date First Available :September 19, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Garnier
 * ASIN :B00KZ25EH2

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars193 ratings Take control of your style! Finish any Curl Shape style with Garnier Fructis Hairspray for long-lasting hold. For more looks, tips and fun visit our Style Hub. • Styling spray gel for curly hair creates curl definition • Curl spray gel with Shea Butter provides long-lasting hold without stickiness or buildup • Boosts your wavy, permed or naturally curly hair with definition and shine minus the frizz • Get the power to create and control any curly style you want Spray generously onto slightly damp or dry hair. Scrunch hair, blow-dry or air-dry.
